metadata.name: Chill Bear Club - Pixel Avatars #1
metadata.description:
The Chill Bear Club's Pixel Avatars is a collection of 5555 pixel art avatars, expanding on the Genesis Chill Bear Collection (available at https://opensea.io/collection/chillbearclub-genesis)

The CBC Pixel Avatars are a fully animated, full-body, and metaverse-ready collection of bears.

Each pixel bear features pixel themed variations of the original genesis artwork. Plus additional animations to be metaverse gaming ready.
